A cloudburst of data, gathered through scraping 


## ‚è≥ Installation
### üêç Pip
```bash
python3 -m pip install cloudburst
```

### üóÉ Source
```bash
git clone https://github.com/cwdt-us/cloudburst.git
cd cloudburst
python3 -m pip install -e .
```
